headline: Can PG's Productivity Drive Fuel EPS Gains Amid Inflation?
summary: Procter & Gamble depends on productivity from cost savings to supply-chain efficiencies to protect margins and support EPS as inflation pressures persist.

raw.headline: Can PG's Productivity Drive Fuel EPS Gains Amid Inflation?

headline: Colgate-Palmolive and WHO Foundation Announce Global Partnership on Oral Health
summary: NEW YORK, January 20, 2026--Today, Colgate-Palmolive announced a new multi-year collaboration with the WHO Foundation to support the World Health Organization's work on oral health. The four-year funding commitment will help expand oral health education, support integration of oral health into national health systems, and raise awareness of oral health as a public health priority. This initiative builds on Colgate’s commitment to providing communities with oral health education and resources. Th

headline: TotalEnergies reports higher refining margins, softer oil and gas sales in Q4
summary: Investing.com -- TotalEnergies said stronger oil-and-gas production and improved downstream performance should help cushion the impact of weaker commodity prices in the fourth quarter of 2025.

raw.headline: TotalEnergies reports higher refining margins, softer oil and gas sales in Q4

headline: Barclays Raises Colgate (CL) Target to $83 but Stays Cautious on Fundamentals
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is included among the 13 Best Dividend Kings to Buy in 2026. On January 16, Barclays analyst Lauren Lieberman raised Barclays’ price target on Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) to $83 from $80 and kept an Equal Weight rating on the stock. The change came as part of the firm’s broader Q4 earnings preview […]
